## dsp-io-wav package

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [WavSpec](./dsp-io-wav.wavspec.md) |  |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [wavByteArray](./dsp-io-wav.wavbytearray.md) | Takes a [WavSpec](./dsp-io-wav.wavspec.md) and iterable of normalized float samples, creates WAV format header, converts samples to specified bit depth and returns <code>Uint8Array</code> of complete WAV file, ready for export. |
|  [wavBytes](./dsp-io-wav.wavbytes.md) | Similar to [wavByteArray](./dsp-io-wav.wavbytearray.md)<!-- -->, but yields an iterator of the result bytes, not an actual byte array. |
|  [wavHeader](./dsp-io-wav.wavheader.md) |  |
